attribute.name: Previous Careers
attribute.rule: concat(.//attribute[@name='Previous Career 5']/@value, u:ifthenelse(boolean(.//attribute[@name='Previous Career 5']), ',', ''), .//attribute[@name='Previous Career 4']/@value, u:ifthenelse(boolean(.//attribute[@name='Previous Career 4']), ',', ''), .//attribute[@name='Previous Career 3']/@value, u:ifthenelse(boolean(.//attribute[@name='Previous Career 3']), ',', ''), .//attribute[@name='Previous Career 2']/@value, u:ifthenelse(boolean(.//attribute[@name='Previous Career 2']), ',', ''), .//attribute[@name='Previous Career 1']/@value)

attribute.name: UsedXP
attribute.rule: sum(.//skill/@value) * 100 + (.//attribute[@name='WSCurr']/@value - .//attribute[@name='WSStart']/@value) * 20 + (.//attribute[@name='BSCurr']/@value - .//attribute[@name='BSStart']/@value) * 20 + (.//attribute[@name='SCurr']/@value - .//attribute[@name='SStart']/@value) * 20 + (.//attribute[@name='TCurr']/@value - .//attribute[@name='TStart']/@value) * 20 + (.//attribute[@name='AglCurr']/@value - .//attribute[@name='AglStart']/@value) * 20 + (.//attribute[@name='IntCurr']/@value - .//attribute[@name='IntStart']/@value) * 20 + (.//attribute[@name='WPCurr']/@value - .//attribute[@name='WPStart']/@value) * 20 + (.//attribute[@name='FelCurr']/@value - .//attribute[@name='FelStart']/@value) * 20 + (.//attribute[@name='WCurr']/@value - .//attribute[@name='WStart']/@value) * 100 + (.//attribute[@name='ACurr']/@value - .//attribute[@name='AStart']/@value) * 100 + (u:parse(.//attribute[@name='MagCurr']/@value) - u:parse(.//attribute[@name='MagStart']/@value)) * 100 - u:rules(concat('.//race[@name=|', .//attribute[@name='Race']/@value, '|]/@experience')) - u:rules(concat('.//class[@name=|', u:ifthenelse(boolean(.//attribute[@name='Previous Career 1']), string(.//attribute[@name='Previous Career 1']/@value), .//attribute[@name='Current Career']/@value), '|]/@experience'))

attribute.name: ArmorPointsLLeg
attribute.rule: u:rules-sum('//equipment[@name=|$1| and @location=|Left Leg|]/@ap', .//equipment[@type='Armor']/@name) + u:rules-sum('//equipment[@name=|$1| and @location=|Legs|]/@ap', .//equipment[@type='Armor']/@name) + u:rules-sum('//equipment[@name=|$1| and @location=|All|]/@ap', .//equipment[@type='Armor']/@name)

attribute.rule: u:rules-sum('//equipment[@name=|$1| and @location=|Right Leg|]/@ap', .//equipment[@type='Armor']/@name) + u:rules-sum('//equipment[@name=|$1| and @location=|Legs|]/@ap', .//equipment[@type='Armor']/@name) + u:rules-sum('//equipment[@name=|$1| and @location=|All|]/@ap', .//equipment[@type='Armor']/@name)

attribute.name: ArmorPointsLArm
attribute.rule: u:rules-sum('//equipment[@name=|$1| and @location=|Left Arm|]/@ap', .//equipment[@type='Armor']/@name) + u:rules-sum('//equipment[@name=|$1| and @location=|Arms|]/@ap', .//equipment[@type='Armor']/@name) + u:rules-sum('//equipment[@name=|$1| and @location=|All|]/@ap', .//equipment[@type='Armor']/@name)
